channel.title: xvfb on IT技术分享
channel.description: Recent content in xvfb on IT技术分享

item.title: xvfb
item.description: $sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install firefox xvfb -y $ sudo aptitude install xfonts-100dpi xfonts-75dpi xfonts-scalable xfonts-cyrillic $ sudo apt-get install fonts-ipafont-gothic fonts-ipafont-mincho export DISPLAY=:10 echo "Starting Xvfb ..." Xvfb :10 -screen 0 1024x768x24 -ac & http://localhost:4444/wd/hub/static/resource/hub.html
